_header: It is well found a passing great damage
_description: Against ‘double intendement’ — three stanzas rhyme royal with refrain.

BLAru26.First Lines:
It is well fownde a passyng grete damageKnowe and repete in euery
                    Regyon…
BLAru26.Last Lines:
…Beth circumspecte not hasty but prudentAnd yevith noo
                    credence with oute advisement
